name: Paint The Town (GladysGlitch, Unlucky Bunny)
description:
The town is a boring mix of black and white and grey. Liven it up a little with your 'paint'! Red is the key but be warned, blood is an unpredictable medium.

WASD or arrow  keys to move. Left click to shoot. Escape to pause.

Made in 2022 for Impossijam: https://itch.io/jam/impossijam
